meanings.definition: Resembling a toad in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The bumpy skin and wide eyes made the creature look toadlike.
meanings.sent2: The toadlike figure hopped slowly across the garden.
meanings.sent3: The toadlike character in the story always seemed to be searching for a hidden pond.
meanings.sent4: Her toadlike features seemed to blend in with the swampy surroundings.
meanings.sent5: The toadlike mask at the costume party was surprisingly realistic.
